snippet: GEFFNER--Nancy Noonan, of Jupiter, Florida, formerly of Tarrytown and Manhattan, NY, passed peacefully on June 25, 2016, surrounded by her beloved husband of 58 years, Irving, and her children, Shari and Steven. Nancy fought to increase career opp...
lead_paragraph: GEFFNER--Nancy Noonan, of Jupiter, Florida, formerly of Tarrytown and Manhattan, NY, passed peacefully on June 25, 2016, surrounded by her beloved husband of 58 years, Irving, and her children, Shari and Steven. Nancy fought to increase career opportunities for women during the 1970's and went on to become a Managing Principal of Right Management Consultants. After a long and successful career, she retired with Irv to the beaches of Jupiter, where she enjoyed spending time with family and many friends. She is survived by her husband, children and grandchildren. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GEFFNER, NANCY NOONAN
